title: S1 Ep8: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Addendum 4: Mr. S's Polygraphs
itunes:title: S1, The State v. Adnan Syed - Addendum 4: Mr. S's Polygraphs
description:
June 1, 2015 / The team examines the two polygraphs taken by Mr. S, who found Hae Min's body, and what they reveal.
